title: Nice but needs themes
comment: This could use a theme refresh,  but other the  that,  it just work's.

title: DayDram
comment: add DayDream functiional, plz!?

title: Nice; more options would be nice
comment: I love the simple, readable interface and day/twilight indication. I would like some the option to remove the minute hand.

title: Great app
comment: Very attractive design, great execution of an idea.

title: More features pleade
comment: Could you add the ability to colorize every part of the clock separately ? Could you also show the night zone according to the real sunset/sunrise at current gps location ? And also a seconds hand ;) Great widget !

title: Doesn't remember the shaded area
comment: It loses track of what area to shade and reverts to default when offline. The widget app should store its last locale along with a table of sunrise and sunset times.

title: Totally useless
comment: It installed, but does not run, no help, no hints. Not ready for release...

title: Finally an intuitive analog clock!
comment: Awesome. Hour hand follows the sun. Greylineo shows local sunrise and sunset. Similar to Botta Design UNO watch face. Would like option to lose the minute hand entirely, like the UNO.

title: Need some improvements
comment: I was long-looking for a 24h face that includes the sunrise and sunset crosslines. This app has it all but with a dull face. It needs to give some color and theme options.  Also, we tend to shutdown the position option to save battery life... The widget needs to remember the sunrise and sunset times and keep them on the face when no position function is available rather than reseting to be at 6am 6pm constantly.

title: Stopped working
comment: I guess after the os update  the widget stopped working. I've done everything I could think of to reinitialize it.

title: Loved it
comment: Would be nice to add seconds

title: Can you make an Android Wear version?
comment: I love that the sunset/sunrise times are shown.
Great.

title: best with other time zone and shows secound
comment: perfect

title: Very nice
comment: Please reduce the border and make the clock face bigger. It seems to be working well on my Samsung Galaxy Note 3.

title: Great full day 24 hr clock!
comment: Wonderful 24 hr clock. I like the full day clock. This is a great open source widget. It would be nice to have an option to turn the right side into PM as I'm not that good with 24 time.

title: 4x4 fullscreen awesome clock
comment: I can resize it to be small or fullscreen! Clock gives two perspectives i want.  1. How much sunlight i have left. 2. The full day in one circle.  This allows a view of the whole of my day, that the standard clocks fail to show.   Makes the ampm standard clock seem irrational.  The min & hr hands starting from dif ends takes getting used too, but is the way it shouldve been all along.  Makes sense.

title: As time passes...
comment: I find myself checking the time more and more to just look at the clock face.
Great watch works well, need to be able to modify it

title: exactly what I was looking for
comment: sunrise/sunset indicator is a nice bonus

title: A work of art
comment: Beautiful and incredibly practical.

title: Stops keeping time.
comment: For some reason it stops keeping time after a few minutes.

title: Fantastic clock
comment: Unfortunately it appears to be broken by lollipop. Disappearing hands on N6,  N9 & my N4 after it's upgrade.

title: Great
comment: This is so good I think physical clocks should be manufactured this way!

title: Amazing idea
comment: Wish it was the default clock. Stuck to my homescreen! Would be amazing if it had options, possibly day/night gradient? Nice work!

title: Pretty snazzy
comment: The clock face doesn't really jell with the current Android style, so the ability to change it would be welcome. That aside, having midnight at the bottom is a nice touch, as is the sunrise/sunset marking. ...side note: another reviewer said there's a "12-hour minute hand" and gave it one star... Whut? It's a sixty-minute minute hand, ya dingus.

title: Why make do with a 12 hour clock dial?
comment: We have 24 hours in a day. Why use a clock or watch that shows only 12? This delightful app also shows when it's dark during that 24 hour day and it is fascinating to see the shaded portion of the dial shrink a little each day towards midsummer and then grow to its maximum at midwinter.

title: Exceptional.
comment: Perfect. Just what I was looking for. Please make more skins.

title: Perfect
comment: Does what it says and does it perfectly.

title: 12h clock minutes
comment: Sure it has an analog 24h clock and looks neat but it has a 12h minute hand? If you want a clock a with 12h minute hand use a 12h clock not this confused app

title: I love it! Just right.
comment: Been living for about 20 years with midnight at top on a quartz clock. Have long wanted noon at the top. In civilian life, that makes more sense (except for hermit night owls).  This image design is spare, but imho just superb. I've made it much bigger on my home screen (N 7 2).  As well, really like the night sector. If it is stuck at exactly a half circle, run an app that requests your location, such as Maps. Dial might be minimum size, blank, for a short time after rebooting. ♥♥♥ {Revised 2014-02-28)

title: I didn't realize I needed this!
comment: Love love love! If there was just a bit of customizability (even just a dark scheme) I would give it five stars!

title: Nice!
comment: Could you make it configurable? I prefer "midnight-on-top" because it is more like a standard watch; iq more easily/natural to read.  (and maybe choose a black dail?) I love the sunset/sunrise indication! Maybe add the moon-phase as well  :-)  Thumbs up for the simplistic design.

Well it *is* a 12-at-the-top clock, so midnight at the top would be a bit of a misnomer. However I've been looking into a way to make it themable so people can draw their own faces and hands, but that'd be a ways off. Thanks for the thumbs up!

title: 4.5 stars
comment: Configurable would make it 5. 0 attachments the top & skins would be win. Permissions are excellent & props for only using cached data. Most important: this widget fails to suck. :-)

title: Exactly what I was looking for
comment: I just happened to get a watch recently that had a 24 hour dial on it. It got me thinking about how odd it is that the standard analogue clock goes around twice every day. I mean, a 24 hour clock is a much clearer indication of where we are in relation to the day. Also, I like apps that do what they do. Simple and clean. This one ticks all the boxes for me.

title: This is a very nicely done 24-hour analog clock
comment: Very tasteful and clean design.   I was hoping to use it as a Daydream on my Android 4.4 phone. I'd love to see that functionality added.

title: Great app but...
comment: I love the clock but it would be nice if the clock had a feature that you can make the clock face standard. I have looked all over and cannot find another like it!

title: Excellent!
comment: Finally a clock showing a full day!  It would be even greater if there was a Smartwatch version.

title: Best analog clock.
comment: Thanks for making it open source.

title: Nice simple design
comment: 4/5 stars. Having noon on bottom would be a nice option as it would match real 24 hour analog wall close clocks.

title: excellent noon/day on top where it belongs !
comment: yay!

title: Awesome. Just what I've been looking for
comment: I collect mechanical watches, now I collect apps. Lol

title: Excellent!
comment: Thanks for your work. This app presents a more intuitive way of telling time that is more consistent with the actual position of the sun.
Brilliant

title: Thumbs up!
comment: Request: large (like) 6x6 for tablets

title: 24 analog clock
comment: Good one..  ツツ

title: Good but too small
comment: The 2x2 size is too small for a clock face with this much detail...go to 4x4 and it would be a winner

title: José A.
comment: "050813...mostly inclined to military time...thanks..."

title: A simple yet practical.
comment: Best analog 24hour watch I have found! Noon is on top and midnight at bottom as it makes sense, while others have it flipped... it also has day and night length which is perfect. I encourage the maker to update his release and add some new appearance and functions. Thanks for this!

title: Neat trick
comment: Now, how do you read an analog clock again?

title: True 24 hour clock face.
comment: Others have tried to get too "arty". I love this one. Some color choices and live wallpaper options would make it perfect.

title: Issues fixed, it works now
comment: It works now. its a really good app

title: Good app
comment: Excellent developer!

title: Perfect visualization
comment: Widget includes features like no one other. Only click action and date digits has been required for me. Just I may add this all by another widget.

title: Simple
comment: Have been looking for one of these. Nice, elegant UI. However, it uses more battery and holds longer wakelocks than I would have expected for such a simple widget.

I'm with you on the battery issue! Unfortunately, the way that the Android Homescreen widget system works requires me to render it to an image and send that to the widget, which takes a lot more effort than simply updating numbers on the screen. I'm aware of the issue, though, and am trying to find a solution.

title: …
comment: 2×2では文字盤しか表示されません。 3×3ならちゃんと表示されるんですが…

title: Of course some design improvements are possible
comment: But keep it light!   Great app, thank you :-) Update : please keep it small or create a separate app!

title: Worked up until March 13...
comment: It was great while it lasted, but the update simply doesn't work reliably. Sorry. Samsung Galaxy S2 Skyrocket, Android 4.0.4.

title: Awesome!
comment: This new scalable version is exactly what I wanted. Also love being able to use it on my lockscreen... Any way to make the lock screen widget scalable too?  Would like to scale to 4x4 if possible.

title: Huh
comment: Really appreciate the idea and realization, but... no chance of 0/24 at the top option? I'm used to it in my wrist watch =)

title: Get widget! Use it all the time.
comment: I'd love to find a wrist watch like this. The concept is so simple, but hard to find. 24 analog clock instead of the usual 12 hour going around twice. Plus, this widget shows dark hours with a shaded background. It's easy to read, and activates system clock. I've used it on several Android devices. Love it!

title: By all means go for it!
comment: Of all the clock apps out there this is the single most intelligent and smoothest-running. If you guys let the user change the color of the elements or at least include a widget with a dark face I would have to rate you 6 stars... But I agree the app drawer icon should go.

title: fantastic.
comment: I've been looking for a 24 hour clock widget that shows sunrise and sunset since I got my G1 in 2008. This widget does exactly what I hoped. Keep up the great work. Hoping to see support for resizing in 4.x. Some customization would be fun too.

title: Beautiful
comment: Nice different from normal analog  clock. Works well on ICS.

title: Widget not resizable,
comment: Too tiny on tablets

title: Good but could be better
comment: Neds a translucent setting to be less harsh.  Also, ties to the native alarm and stop watch functions.

title: Great!
comment: An option to eliminate the minute hand would be very nice.

title: Excellent
comment: It's just what it is, a 24 hour clock with the local daylight indicated. Elegant. Thanks!

title: Wow!!!!
comment: How long I wish such clock. And I find it!
Excellent clock.  Best analog I've seen anywhere.

title: Nice widget.
comment: Developer is very responsive to emails too.

title: Very cool
comment: Works on the Galaxy Nexus running Jellybean, less is more as they say :)   Looks good next to 'Year Clock Widget' by John Wundes.

title: Awesome.
comment: I thought of one of these, Googled, and here it is.  =]  Any plans to make a live wallpaper out of it, so app and other shortcuts can be placed on top?

title: Please hurry with NOTE support!
comment: Excellent idea, crap app on the Galaxy NOTE! Hasn't kept the correct time since downloading it. No menu, and goes invisible half the time when adding widget to home page. Better NOTE support will get you a better review.

title: Perfect
comment: This is exactly that for which I was looking, and the fact that the developer has licensing competence only makes it better! : )

title: HTC EVO
comment: CAN'T get it to show up, any help.

title: great job
comment: is it possible to set the 0000hours on the top position instead of the bottom? i would give a 5, if there is such setting. btw great job.

title: Bigger
comment: Would rate 5 stars if there was a larger sized widget

title: Remove App Drawer Icon Please!
comment: As much as I love the look and functionality of the widget, I hate widgets that put a redundant app drawer icon. Please remove it.
Too small!
Just what I was looking for!

title: Tested from the arctic
comment: Sunrise and set works great at 68 degrees North. Brilliant widget. May I request a larger size?
I love this app. A 24 hour clock face with 12 at the top, so it mimicks the sun's path in the sky. I wish I could find a good wristwatch like this.

title: Great
comment: Just installed, immediately love it. Thanks!!

title: Perfect 24 hour clock
comment: Thank you! So many of the clocks around here only show half the day. And the fact you GPL'd it... thank you for a great widget!

title: Please customize
comment: Please add a option to make clock transparent or change color

title: Awesome
comment: Been looking for one of these forever
